author: greystroke
content: The latest Reth PRs more than doubled their bandwidth and significantly shortened their block time so it now the fastest EL clients on both metrics, by over 2x for bandwidth! Be curious to see what PRs are responsible for this huge performance improvement so other EL clients can try to adopt these optimizations as well.
